DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare esthetic , functional biological property two restoration material use fill cavity . One material call `` Herculite™ Ultra , '' traditional tooth color resin composite place cavity layer harden UV light . The second material call `` SonicFill™ 2 , '' bulk fill composite use ultrasonic hand piece ( SonicFill 2010 ) change material solid liquid order place cavity . This material place cavity 1 layer , harden use UV light . Both material FDA approve non-significant risk device fill cavity , Herculite™ Ultra widely use dental clinic . In subject , one tooth cavity randomly select receive one fill material , second tooth cavity randomly select receive second material . The filling observe two year period determine clinical acceptability .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Kerr SonicFill™ 2 v Herculite™ Ultra
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize , split-mouth , control , examiner-blinded clinical evaluation Class II restoration use new bulk-fill composite ( SonicFill™ 2 ) compare Herculite™ Ultra resin composite place traditional incremental technique . The primary objective study evaluate clinical performance sonic-activated , bulk fill composite , SonicFill™ 2 , compare Herculite™ Ultra follow category : Esthetic Properties - Surface luster - Staining - surface - Staining - margin - Color match translucency - Esthetic anatomical form Functional Properties - Fracture material retention - Marginal adaptation - Aproximal anatomical form - contact point - Radiographic examination ( applicable ) - Patient 's view Biological Properties - Postoperative ( hyper- ) sensitivity tooth vitality - Recurrence caries , erosion , abfraction - Tooth integrity ( enamel crack , tooth fracture ) - Adjacent mucosa The hypothesis test sonic-activated , bulk fill composite , SonicFill™ 2 , comparable result traditional incremental technique composite , Herculite™ Ultra , overall clinical acceptability compare category
DOC.criteria: Is least 18 year age Is willing provide voluntary write informed consent Is good medical health able tolerate dental procedure Has least 1 pair qualify molar premolar require Class II restoration . Restorations must buccal lingual/palatal width equal great 1/3 distance buccal lingual/palatal cusp tip Study teeth must occlusal function must also contact neighbor tooth least one surface Study teeth must vital ( i.e. , free clinical sign symptom periapical pathology ) Is currently take part evaluation dental restorative material Has chronic periodontitis rampant caries Teeth exhibit clinical sign periapical pathology Teeth history selfreported preoperative pulpal problem Women pregnant ( selfreported ) . It standard care postpone routine dental procedure radiographed pregnancy . Women breast feeding . Known allergy resin composite local anesthetic . Abnormal oral soft tissue finding ( e.g. , open sore , lesion ) An employee sponsor member immediate family . Condition affect salivary flow ( e.g. , salivary gland disorder , Sjögren 's Syndrome ) Any restorative treatment teeth involve study last 12 month .
